overview: First love is like the flash of a match. It will burn, go out, but it will not burn out to the end.  A young, naive, urban girl, Vasilisa, is forced to spend a week visiting her grandmother in the village, where she meets a group of local guys and falls in love with Shura – a bold, impulsive guy. But even the first love can become fatal if insidious plans interfere with the relationship.
title: Don't Call Me Vasya
